trans-unit.source: Returns result information for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition" /> 類別的結果資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> class exposes an event of type EventHandler\<ConditionalEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition>類別會公開類型事件處理常式的事件\<ConditionalEventArgs >。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the event is to provide information about the result of the condition evaluation (`true` or `false`) through the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the event args.
trans-unit.target: 事件的目的是要提供與條件評估之結果的相關資訊 (`true`或`false`) 透過<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs.Result%2A>事件引數的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs" /> class using the result of the condition.
trans-unit.target: 使用條件的結果，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the result of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition" /> evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition" /> 評估的結果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the result of the condition is true; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果條件的結果為 true，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
